queryobj.querysql: select tablename,tablenamecn,parentname,tablecat,pagereccount,tabletype,_CreateTime from T_E_Sys_TableInfo where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select '' _autoid,tablename,0 StyleIndex,'默认样式' StyleName,'' Memo,_CreateTime,_UpdateTime from T_E_Sys_TableInfo where tablename='@tablename' union select _autoid,tablename,StyleIndex,StyleName,Memo,_CreateTime,_UpdateTime from T_E_Sys_TableStyle where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i.employeeName as CreateUser,i._createtime,i.deptName,i.instanceName,i._autoid as instanceId,i.AppName,i.AppId ,t._AutoId as taskId,t.TaskName,t.ArriveTime,u.OwnerId,u.isshare,u.taskState,d.workflowname,i.companyname,u._autoId as uTaskId,e.employeeName agentName,isnull(u.agentId,'') agentId from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_task t on i._AutoId=t.instanceId inner join t_e_wf_usertask u on t._AutoId=u.taskid inner join t_e_wf_define d on d._autoid=i.workflowid left join t_e_org_employee e on isnull(u.agentId,'')=e._autoId where u._IsDel=0 ) t where (TaskState = '0' or TaskState = '1') and (ownerId='@employeeId' or agentId='@employeeId') and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime,u.dealtime ,i.AppName,d.WorkflowCode,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee from T_E_WF_Instance i inner join T_E_WF_UserTask u on u.InstanceId=i._AutoID inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId where u.TaskState='2' and (u.ownerId='@employeeId' or u.dealUser ='@employeeId' )) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime ,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee ,u.DealTime,d.WorkflowName,u.PositionId,u.PositionName from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId inner join (select InstanceId,PositionId,PositionName,MAX(DealTime) DealTime from t_e_wf_usertask where TaskState='2' and PositionId in (select PositionId from T_E_Org_DeptEmployee where EmployeeId='@employeeId') group by InstanceId,PositionId,PositionName ) u on i._autoId=u.instanceId) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime,u.dealtime ,i.AppName,d.WorkflowCode,i.FinishTime,d.WorkflowName,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee from T_E_WF_Instance i inner join T_E_WF_UserTask u on u.InstanceId=i._AutoID inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId where u.TaskState='2' and u.deptId ='@deptId' ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime ,i.FinishTime,a._autoId GDId,d.WorkflowName,i.AppName ,d.WorkflowCode from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowId=d._autoId left join T_OA_DA_ArchiveInfo a on i._autoid=a.instanceId where i.InstanceState='完成' and exists (select instanceId from t_e_wf_usertask u where i._autoId=u.instanceId and u.TaskState='2' and (u.ownerId='@employeeId' or u.dealUser ='@employeeId' ))) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime,i.Deadline ,i.AppName,d.WorkflowCode,i._UserName,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee,d.WorkflowName from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime ,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee,d.workflowName,DATEDIFF(d,i._createTime,getdate()) Days from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowId=d._autoid) t where InstanceState='处理中' and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,instanceName,deptName,CompanyName,instanceState,EmployeeName,i._CreateTime,d.workflowName,DATEDIFF(d,i._createTime,i.FinishTime) Days ,i.FinishTime from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowId=d._autoid ) t where (instanceState='归档' or instanceState='完成' or instanceState='终止' ) and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select i._AutoId instanceId ,instanceName,i.deptName,CompanyName,instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime ,FinishTime,t.TaskName,t._AutoID taskId,t.Deadline,t.ArriveTime,t.OverTimeAlertFirst, u.EmployeeName as dealuser from t_e_wf_instance i inner join T_E_WF_Task t on i._AutoID=t.InstanceId inner join T_E_WF_UserTask u on t._AutoID = u.TaskId where InstanceState='处理中' and (t.TaskState='0' or t.TaskState='1' ) and u.DealTime>GETDATE() ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName,i._CreateTime ,i.CompanyId,i._UserName,i.FinishTime,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee,d.WorkflowName ,DATEDIFF(d,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeArriveTime(i._AutoId),getdate()) ArriveDays,d.workflowCode from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select _AutoId InstanceId ,InstanceName,deptName,CompanyName,InstanceState,EmployeeName,_CreateTime ,FinishTime from t_e_wf_instance where (instanceState='完成' or instanceState='归档') and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select d.*,(select count(*) from T_E_Sys_DictEntry e where e.dictid=d._AutoID) as itemsnum from T_E_Sys_Dict d where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select * from AppDict where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select * from T_E_Mail_POP3 where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select * from T_E_Mail_Folder where |^condition^| and _isdel=0 |^sortdir^|
select _autoid,subject,receivers,createTime from T_E_Mail_Message where sendflag=0 and _isdel=0 and sender='[!employeeid!]' and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select _autoid,subject,receivers,createTime from T_E_Mail_Message where _isdel=0 and sendflag=1 and sender='[!employeeId!]' and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select '' recid, _autoid as mailid, subject,senderName,_createtime createtime from T_E_Mail_Message where Sender='[!employeeId!]' and _isdel=1 union select r._autoid recid , mailid, m.subject,m.sendername,m._createtime createtime from T_E_Mail_Message m inner join T_E_Mail_Receiver r on m._autoid=r.mailid where r._isdel=1 and r.receiverid='[!employeeid!]'
) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
select [Name] TableName from sysobjects where xtype='u' and [Name] not in (select TableName from T_E_Sys_TableInfo) and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select _autoid fileid,factfilename filename,folderid,filetype,filesize ,100+isnull(orderid,0) orderid,_createtime, (select EmployeeName from t_e_org_employee emp where emp._autoid=t_e_file_file._username) owner ,'' share,'0' limit from t_e_file_file where _isdel=0 union select _autoid fileid,foldername filename,FolderPID folderid,'' filetype,0 filesize,orderid,_createtime, (select EmployeeName from t_e_org_employee emp where emp._autoid=t_e_file_folder._username) owner ,len(shareUser) share,'0' limit from t_e_file_folder where _isdel=0 ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select _autoid folderId,folderName,FolderPID,'' filetype,0 filesize,orderid,_createtime,ShareUserId, (select EmployeeName from t_e_org_employee emp where emp._autoid=t_e_file_folder._username) ownerName ,1 share from t_e_file_folder where _isdel=0 ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select d.employeeid, e.employeecode,e.employeename,d.deptname,d.positionname,e.refreshtime,e.lastlogintime, (select deptname from T_E_Org_Department dp where dp._AutoID= d.CompanyId) companyname from T_E_Org_Employee e inner join T_E_Org_DeptEmployee d on e._AutoID = d.EmployeeID where e._IsDel=0 and d._IsDel=0 and d.DeptEmployeeType=0 and datediff(s, e.RefreshTime, getdate()) < @interval ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select m._autoid msgid, m.title,m.sender,m._username,m.recids,m.recnames,m.sendtime,m.content,r.isread,r._autoid recid from T_E_App_MsgInfo m inner join T_E_App_MsgRec r on m._AutoID = r.MsgId where r._IsDel=0 and r.RecId='@employeeId' and isnull(m.msgType,'')<>'1' ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select _autoid msgid, title,sender,_username,recids,recnames,sendtime,content, (select top 1 isread from T_E_App_MsgRec rec where rec.msgId=T_E_App_MsgInfo._autoid) isread from T_E_App_MsgInfo where _IsDel=0 and _username='@employeeId' and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from ( select de.EmployeeId, em.EmployeeCode,em.EmployeeName,em.Officephone,em.Cellphone,em.Sex,em.EMail, dm.DeptName CompanyName, de.DeptName ,de.PositionName from T_E_Org_DeptEmployee de inner join T_E_Org_Employee em on de.EmployeeID=em._AutoID inner join T_E_Org_Department dm on de.CompanyId= dm._AutoID where de.DeptEmployeeType=0 and de._IsDel=0 ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select de._AutoID RelationID,de.DeptEmployeeType,de.PositionId,de.PositionName, de.DeptName,de.DeptID,de.OrderID DeOrderID ,de.EmployeeId, (select DeptName from T_E_Org_Department d where d._autoid=de.CompanyId) CompanyName , em.EmployeeName,em.LoginName,em.EmployeeCode,em.Sex,em.Cellphone,em.Officephone ,em.IsLocked,em._AutoID from T_E_Org_DeptEmployee de inner join T_E_Org_Employee em on de.EmployeeID=em._AutoID) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select de._AutoID RelationID,de.DeptEmployeeType,de.PositionId,de.PositionName, de.DeptName,de.DeptID,de.OrderID DeOrderID ,de.EmployeeId , (select DeptName from T_E_Org_Department d where d._autoid=de.CompanyId) CompanyName , (select count(*) from T_E_Org_DeptEmployee jz where jz.employeeId=em._autoId and jz.DeptEmployeeType=1) JzNum , em.EmployeeName,em.LoginName,em.EmployeeCode,em.Sex,em.Cellphone,em.Officephone ,em.IsLocked,em._AutoID from T_E_Org_DeptEmployee de inner join T_E_Org_Employee em on de.EmployeeID=em._AutoID where de.DeptEmployeeType=0) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select *,(select TypeName from T_E_Org_DeptType t where t._AutoID=d.TypeID) TypeName ,(select LoginName from T_E_Org_User u where u.CompanyID=d._autoid) sa ,(select DeptName from T_E_Org_Department t where t._AutoId=d.CompanyId) CompanyName from T_E_Org_Department d where _isdel=0 and |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

select * from (select i._AutoId instanceId ,i.instanceName,i.deptName,i.CompanyName,i.instanceState,i.EmployeeName, i._CreateTime,i.Deadline,i.AppName,d.WorkflowCode,i._UserName,i.FinishTime, dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeName(i._AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeEmployee(i._AutoID) ActiveEmployee ,h.StartTime,h.EndTime,h.HyState from t_e_wf_instance i inner join t_e_wf_define d on i.workflowid=d._autoId inner join T_OA_HY_Apply h on i.AppId=h._AutoID where i.appName='T_OA_HY_Apply' ) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|
